gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 Fury Series (FIJI, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Fails to start with "DirectX 10 Device Not Found!" error.
title: Hard Reset Redux

notes: When I tried to run the game, I got the error "Failed to create IDXGIFactory1, Windows Vista SP2 or higher operating system needed!" When I used the launch option "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" I got the error "DirectX 10 device not found!" Any other launch options (or combinations of launch options) just causes it to run then immediately exit. It was unplayable for me with both Proton 3.7-6 and Proton 3.7-7 Beta. It's a shame too. I really wanted this to work.
title: Hard Reset Redux

notes: Set all graphics to ultra, including buffering, within the game. Because the settings were changed in game, I'm going to rate as Platinum.
title: Hard Reset Redux
